mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_FULLDIVE_USER ( ARTIST_CATEGORY, ARTIST_DESCRIPTION, ARTIST_SNS_I, ARTIST_SNS_F, ARTIST_SNS_T, ARTIST_SNS_Y, ARTIST_SNS_W, ARTIST_COMPANY, ARTIST_APPROVAL, ARTIST_NAME, ARTIST_EMAIL, ARTIST_BIRTH, ARTIST_GENDER, ARTIST_MEMBER, ARTIST_PHONE, ARTIST_NATION, ARTIST_ACCEPT, ARTIST_PASSWORD ) VALUES ( #{artistCategory}, #{artistDescription}, #{artistSnsI}, #{artistSnsF}, #{artistSnsT}, #{artistSnsY}, #{artistSnsW}, #{artistCompany}, #{artistApproval}, #{artistName}, #{artistEmail}, #{artistBirth}, #{artistGender}, #{artistMember}, #{artistPhone}, #{artistNation}, #{artistAccept}, #{artistPassword} )
